languages.text:
[draft]The Psyker grasps the target with telekinesis. Targeting a new creature when someone is already grasped by this power will remove the grasp from the previous target.
If the target is an enemy, this grasp crushes them at the start of every Psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The enemy suffers <u>(from 1 to Psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g})+2×({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> damage. Using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a new target does not restart the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
When someone is already in the grasp of this power, it can be used on the point within the battlefield, and the target will be moved <u>psy rating</u> cells toward the targeted point.

traits.locale_text:
[draft]The Psyker grasps the target with telekinesis. Targeting a new creature when someone is already grasped by this power will remove the grasp from the previous target.
If the target is an enemy, this grasp crushes them at the start of every Psyker's turn. The enemy suffers <u>(from 1 to Psyker's Willpower)+2×(psy rating)</u> damage. Using this ability on a new target does not restart the cooldown.
When someone is already in the grasp of this power, it can be used on the point within the battlefield, and the target will be moved <u>psy rating</u> cells toward the targeted point.
